0: Staying in the villas with a family is a wonderful experience
The friendliness of the staff was unparalleled by any luxury vacation I have experienced to date
Great service with excellent staff and beautiful setting
The Four Seasons just created lifetime customers out of my husband and I We honeymooned in Saint Kits and after a poor experience at the Mariot we were staying at we decided to book a night in Nevis

Our experience started as soon as we landed in satin kits four seasons employees where waiting for us at the airports helped with our luggage the driver had give us some informations about Saint Kits history which was very interesting we took a boat ride to Nevis free drinks on board helpful crew
Top Dollar Top Experience Outstanding Staff and Management
We loved the laid back vibe the non touristy atomosphere ie no one trying to sell you anything the friendly unassuming locals and of course we loved the resort
The staff really made the experience knew me by name provided timely and effective help
This happened at 2 pools and was a pretty routine experience
1: Having stayed at over 20 Four seasons this might be my worst experience
However the experience did n’t even rate 1 star
The experience was inconsistent the service often beyond rude and dismissive
It just seemed kind of tired compared to the rest of the vibrant updates
Who wants a ten minute boat ride and a long ride in a vanRed Roof Experience not Four Seasons but they continue to pretend they care about the first experience
Shal definitely be returning for the experience
So I had say be prepared to spend Four Seasons prices and have a B grade experience in terms of the property and service
Bananas was in a beautiful setting but the food was not that good and the service was VERY slow
After our experience I read other reviews and saw that ours was very similar to others
